      • opening

        public IGeometry opening(IPolygon polygon)

        Returns:

      • erosion

        public IGeometry erosion(IPolygon geom)

        Apply erosion to a polygon that can contain holes.

        Parameters:
        geom - : geometry to modifie.
        Returns:
        IGeometry : the eroded geometry (a IPolygon or a IMultiSurface or null).
